column4: I am recieving an grub error 17 when ever I try to boot. I booted into the livecd of ubuntu but it does not recognize my ubuntu drive(hda) but it recognizes my window drive (hdb). How can i make the livecd see the first hardrive?
yes! it sees at as unallocated
can you not mount it via "Places" ?
sorry its over my head and you could do a lot of damage with whatever you do:)
cant see his linux partition and i cant help him... anyone who knows linuxy things pls help him
the -l is a lowercase L, not a 1, not an I
just type fdisk -l (lowercase L) does it output anything?
you are booted from cd are you?
and your main partition is unaccessible
you suffered a HD loss but the HD is healthy and the data is still phyisically there... thats what we agree on right?
i suggest you google and try for 3 days to get back your data, or you accept its gone
windows showed me a 12TB partition when my mbr was sick:))
have you tired unplugging that xp drive?
maybe you set the jumpers wrong when you installed the HD
